code: import React,{useState}from'react';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";;const Authorization=props=>{const[username,setUsername]=useState('');const[password,setPassword]=useState('');const handleLogin=()=>{props.setLogin(username,password);};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"background",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{className:"header",children:"Login Here"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{htmlFor:"username",children:"Username"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",placeholder:"Email or Phone",id:"username",value:username,onChange:e=>setUsername(e.target.value)}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{htmlFor:"password",children:"Password"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"password",placeholder:"Password",id:"password",value:password,onChange:e=>setPassword(e.target.value)}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:handleLogin,children:"Log In"})]});};export default Authorization;
